amendment.description: Amendment deletes language that removes the current prohibition on direct U.S. assistance to the Government of Azerbaijan.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 52 in the Congressional Record of June 20, 1995, to delete the provisions of the bill that removes the current prohibition on direct government- to government aid between the U.S. and the government of Azerbaijan.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Visclosky amendment (A026) Agreed to by voice vote.
